text.div:
AMA CPT CMS HCPCS Procedure Modifiers

CPT (HCPCS I) and HCPCS II procedure modifier codes.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cpt-modifiers
  • Include all codes defined in http://www.cms.gov/hcpcs-level-II-modifiers

name: AMACPTCMSHCPCSProcedureModifiers
title: AMA CPT CMS HCPCS Procedure Modifiers
description: CPT (HCPCS I) and HCPCS II procedure modifier codes.
